Articles.Content:
KSP made a space nerd out of me. I am taking a break from work today to watch the ESA as they attempt to land on Comet 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko.

http://www.accuweather.com/en/features/trend/esa_first_comet_landing_rosetta_spacecraft/37172118

The lander will use harpoons to anchor itself to the comet nucleus. On a side note, I wish the Kerbal Klaw would work on Gilly.
And Success! We have officially landed on a comet! Sorry for all the exclamation marks! This is just way too cool! ESA is now doing tests to determine what kind of condition the lander is in!
